This is a list of experimental features that you can enable. These features are still under development; they are not fully tested, and might reduce EUR-Lex stability. Don't forget to give your feedback! Warning! Experimental feature conflicts detected. Replacement of CELEX identifiers by short titles - experimental feature. It replaces clickable CELEX identifiers of treaties and case-law by short titles. Visualisation of document relationships. It displays a

name: homepage.html
text: they are not fully tested, and might reduce EUR-Lex stability. Don't forget to give your feedback! Warning! Experimental feature conflicts detected. Replacement of CELEX identifiers by short titles - experimental feature. It replaces clickable CELEX identifiers of treaties and case-law by short titles. Visualisation of document relationships. It displays a dynamic graph with relations between the act and related documents. It is currently only available for legal acts. Deep linking. It enables links to other legal acts referred to within the documents. It is currently only available for documents smaller than 900 KB. Append an asterisk ( * ) to a search term to find variations of it (transp * , 32019R * ). Use a question mark ( ? ) instead of a single character in your search term to find variations of it (ca ? e finds case, cane, care). Search tips Need more search options? name: homepage.html
text: * ). Use a question mark ( ? ) instead of a single character in your search term to find variations of it (ca ? e finds case, cane, care). Search tips Need more search options? Use the Advanced search Official Journal OJ L Series : 20/05/2025 (23 acts) OJ C Series : 20/05/2025 (13 acts) Find results by document number Year Help to search for the document year in the ‘find results by document number’ widget. Number Help to enter the act number in the ‘find results by document number’ widget. Example: 1036 for Regulation (EU) 2016/1036, or 725 for Communication COM (2016) 0725. Read more on numbering of acts. Type Help to choose the type of document in the ‘find results by document number widget’. All document types Regulation Directive Decision EU court case COM and JOIN documents SEC or SWD documents Find results by CELEX number CELEX number Help to enter the CELEX number in the ‘find results by CELEX number’ widget. The CELEX number is the Uunique identifier of a document on EUR-Lex (e.g. 32006L0121). You can also enter partial numbers, replacing the missing characters with wildcards: * for multiple characters, ? for a

name: homepage.html
text: number CELEX number Help to enter the CELEX number in the ‘find results by CELEX number’ widget. The CELEX number is the Uunique identifier of a document on EUR-Lex (e.g. 32006L0121). You can also enter partial numbers, replacing the missing characters with wildcards: * for multiple characters, ? for a single character. More about CELEX numbers.
